description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Forced to play a "Game of Horror" by your disturbed capture, you must search frantically for the key to escape the mansion before you are hunted down.  Jump scares galore await those not faint of heart!
description.short: Forced to play a "Game of Horror" by your disturbed capture, you must search frantically for the key to escape the mansion before you are hunted down.  Jump scares galore await those not faint of heart!
